name: Spook them All !
description:
Welcome to Spook Them All, a strategy game where you must scare the inhabitants of the haunted house away. But beware, do not use the same tricks too often! The inhabitants will see it as an opportunity to grab their courage and get you out off the house!

Will you be able to become the new sole and only master of the haunted house?
